thread.title: Euro 2016: Albania players get heroes’ welcome
thread.title_full: Euro 2016: Albania players get heroes’ welcome

author: wtopstaff
title: Euro 2016: Albania players get heroes’ welcome
text:
Home » News » Sports » Euro 2016: Albania players… Euro 2016: Albania players get heroes’ welcome By The Associated Press October 12, 2015 10:09 am Albanian soccer fans shout slogans as they wait for the arrival of their national soccer team in Tirana, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015. Albania beat Armenia on Sunday and qualified for the European Soccer Championship in France next summer for first time. (AP Photo/Hektor Pustina) 
TIRANA, Albania (AP) — Players in the Albanian national football team have come home to a heroes’ welcome after qualifying for the 2016 European Championships — the first major tournament the country has ever reached. 
Hundreds of jubilant fans gathered at Tirana’s Mother Teresa Airport Monday as players returned a day after beating Armenia 3-0 for second place in Group I behind Portugal. 
Prime Minister Edi Rama gave players a red carpet welcome at his office after traveling to the airport and hugging players as they came off the plane. President Bujar Nishani awarded the team the country’s highest civilian award, the Honor of National Order. 
Much of the capital Tirana remained draped in the national colors, red and black, after a night of street celebrations. Topics:
